Other retailers: https://publishing.andrewsmcmeel.com/book/the-terrible-paradox-of-self-awareness/
–––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––
From Perennialism to his theory of consciousness, the philosophical work of Aldous Huxley is an often-overlooked area of his writing. In this video, we explore it. Is our understanding of consciousness sort of backwards, duped by consciousness itself? According to Huxley, it is.
